home-intro: Let QVPN show you a whole new world.
note: Earn rewards by helping others to watch Disney +
intro-title: Watch Disney + with Jelly Boo for free
macos-1-1: You can download the v2RayU Client here
macos-1-2: Make sure your v2RayU is up to date.
macos-4-title: Click“ Import Server From Pasteboard” via v2rayU icon in the menu bar
windows-1-1: You can download the v2rayN here
windows-1-2: Make sure your v2rayN is up to date.
windows-2-1: Once downloaded, unzip the archive to a location you prefer.
windows-2-2: You can then go ahead and open the“ v2rayN.exe” file.
windows-4-title: Import bulk URL from clipboard to the v2rayN toolbar.
windows-5-1: Select the menu "Http proxy" and then select "global mode"
windows-6-title: Set the server you imported as active server
ios-2-title: Save Config QRCode to your album
ios-3-1: Click scan icon in the Upper left corner, and scan QRcode.
ios-3-2: You can also save QRcode and import the QRcode from your album to Shadowrocket.
ios-4-title: Turn on Disney + and allow Shadowrocket to add configuration
ios-5-title: Go to setting and turn on VPN configuration
ios-6-1: You will need to have a United States Apple Account to download the app.
ios-6-2: Go to Apple Store download Disney+ and sign up an account.
and-2-title: Save Config QRCode to your album
and-3-title: Click "+" icon, and tap "Import config from QRcode"
and-5-1: You will need to have a United States Google Play Account to download the app.
and-5-2: download Disney+ and sign up an account.
last-step: If you’ d like to take a trial of watching Disney + , our community supports you for Disney + free trial. Come join us!
footer-dis: Join our community to get a free Disney+ account
